se.wizard.laststand

Class GameGestureHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • SimpleOnGestureListener
      • se.wizard.laststand.GameGestureHandler

  • public class GameGestureHandler
extends SimpleOnGestureListener
    A simple gesturehandler handling gestures from a touchscreen and translates them to actions to the game engine.
    Author:
    Mattias
